titlePage.titlePart: Søgur af Katle Hæng Grime Lodin kinnu og Orvar Odde.

msItem.title: Ketils saga hængs
msItem.incipit: Hallbiørn het madur, hann var kalladur Hallbiørn half-trøll
msItem.explicit: Ketill hængur riede fyrir Hrafnistu medann han lifde
msItem.finalRubric: og endum vier hier þátt af Katle hæng
msItem.note: Abbreviated and most verses omitted (cf. typescript catalog).

msItem.title: Gríms saga loðinkinna
msItem.incipit: Grymur son Ketils var bædi mikill og sterkur
msItem.explicit: Grimur biö i Hrafnistu til elle
msItem.finalRubric: og endum vier so sóguna af Grimi lodinkinnu
msItem.note: Abbreviated and most verses omitted (cf. typescript catalog).

msItem.title: Örvar-Odds saga
msItem.incipit: Þad er upphaf þessarar sogu ad madur er nefndur Grimur lodinn kinna
msItem.explicit: enn mær su sem Oddur atte a Jrlande for nordur til Hrafnistu og er mikel ætt fra henne komenn
msItem.finalRubric: og endum vier hier soguna af Ørvar Odde, enom vydførla. Tantum.
msItem.note: Abbreviated and most verses omitted (cf. typescript catalog).

handDesc.handNote: Majority of the text written in a kurrent script, but the first line of each page, the first line of each chapter and verses (e.g. fol. 59v) are written in a chancery script.

decoDesc.decoNote: Chapters begin with floriated, multi-story initials.

binding.p: Bound in 19th century (?) half-calf over marbled paper boards. The spine title reads: Katle Hæng Saga.

origin.p: Written some time during the eighteenth century (cf. typescript catalog).

provenance.p: Purchased from Petersen bergráði in 1849 (cf. typescript catalog).

revisionDesc.change: Added template elements and input data from Jónas Kristjánsson's typescript catalog, "Skrá um íslenzk handrit í Noregi". Cataloged from photographs housed at the AMI.
